language.entry: The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
My presence is intimidating; religious classes will not accompany me.
I don't know what's worse, an eldritch deity or an old shieldbearer.
A man of stone is worthless to me.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
I refuse to travel with a sanguine knight.
Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Dark and corrupted, the Revenant is a sanguine knight with unmatched durability. As a master of the dark arts, he saps the blood of his adversaries at a cost, weakens them and empowers himself as his enemies bleed. He strives to preserve order through chaos and destruction.
Revenant is a blood knight from the ancient age. Despised by many for a very good reason, he weakens his group to strengthen himself however, we need all the help we can get in these dire times.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
This bandage should be of use to you.
You are lucky i'm on your side... for now.
Follow my lead and we will prevail!
You should fear me more than this place.
Let the darkness flow through you! Embrace it!
The end is only the beginning.
Through chaos, I will have order.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Darkness, restore me!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Give me strength!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. My wounds close!.
Your lives matter not to me!
We only made it this far because of me!
Why am I travelling with these fools?
The power of the dark arts!
So this is what fear feels like...
I know what you are up to.
Come out! I know you are there!
You all mean nothing to me!
All of this belongs to me!
I am the reason we still live!
You will give me your blood!
There is no reason to continue.
I will not speak to you.
We should just let it go.
To perish now or later, it makes no difference.
You do not tell me what to do!
I'm unable to take action right now.
Why should I even care about this?
I will attack when I want to!
I will do what I need to!
Why should I listen to you?
I will win this on my own.
I do what I want to do.
I will do what I need to do.
I do not want to perish in this dungeon.
There is something in the dark.
Be on your guard - we are being watched.
I never wanted to travel with any of you.
I wish you were more competent.
I'm the leader of this expedition.
If we survive, I will take all the glory!
We should just cook ourselves in this fire.
I just don't see us surviving this.
Maybe I should just go back...
I command YOU, not the other way around!
Make me feel it! Make me feel alive again!
I know what you are up to.
Stop telling me what to do!
No, they are waiting to ambush us!
Dying is just a part of living.
I'm sick and tired of you.
Why are you in my way?
No! Why did you attack so soon?
You wanted to miss, didn't you?
Is it so hard to dodge?
Just move out of the way.
This is not a good idea.
Where are all the enemies hiding?
We cannot go the other way.
That is not ideal - I need to suffer.
I do not listen to your commands.
Get out of my head, reaver.
I shouldn't do that - they are anticipating it.
No, that's just what they want.
That is unwise - my wounds may not heal.
Suffering is the way - healing is not.
There is no reason to heal me.
I make the decisions around here.
That will not help our cause.
That is not a wise idea.
Fear is such an interesting emotion.
Something is lurking in the shadows.
Pain is a way of life.
I'm the leader of this group.
This fear is getting to me.
I don't trust any of you.
Such a sad example of life.
We should just leave this place.
Remember that you are alive only because I allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
There's something wrong with this food...
Did you put something in this food?
You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.

The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.

Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Le Revenant n'est rien sans sa hache, son bouclier et son armure lourde. Tout son quipement est imbu d'une puissante magie noire - certains disent mme qu'il est possd. Tandis que son bouclier indestructible fait saigner ses ennemis, sa double hache assoiffe de sang les brise.
Les membres de l'Ordre du sang ne voyagent pas ensemble.
Ma prsence intimide les personnes religieuses; elles ne m'accompagneront pas.
Lequel des deux est le plus insupportable : une divinit aberrante ou un vieux porte-bouclier ?
Une statue ambulante ne vaut rien mes yeux.
Les membres de l'Ordre du sang ne voyagent pas ensemble.
Je refuse de voyager avec des chevaliers sanguinaires.
Je ne fais pas confiance aux chevaliers de leur Ordre.
Les chevaliers de sang me mprisent, et pas qu'un peu.

Sombre et corrompu, le Revenant est un chevalier sanguinaire avec une rsistance ingale. En tant que matre des art noirs, il peut, un certain prix, vider ses ennemis de leur sang, les affaiblir et se renforcer lui-mme tandis qu'ils continuent de saigner. De manire paradoxale, il s'efforce de prserver l'ordre au travers du chaos et de la destruction.

Le Revenant est un chevalier de sang de l'ge antique. Son utilisation des pouvoirs de son Ordre le rend mpris de tous : Il a tendance se renforcer au prix du sang de ses compagnons, mme si les avantages qu'il obtient ne sont pas ngligeables...
Je suis la raison pour laquelle nous sommes alls aussi loin. Je dois en finir !
Rassure-toi, je suis de ton ct pour le moment.
Tu as moins craindre de cet endroit que de moi.
Laisse les Tnbres s'couler travers ton corps! Accepte leur treinte !
Mmm... Mon essence gagne en puissance !
Cet endroit me rappelle... ma demeure.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Que les Tnbres me rtablissent !
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Donnez-moi la force !
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. Mes plaies se ferment!
Je n'ai que faire de vos vies!
Nous ne sommes arrivs jusqu'ici que grce moi !
Pourquoi suis-je en train de voyager avec ces imbciles ?
Je ne cderai pas la peur !
Montrez-vous ! Je sais que vous tes l !
Vous ne valez rien mes yeux !
Pourquoi vous acharner essayer malgr votre incomptence ?
Vous tes sans espoir ! Tous autant que vous tes
Je suis ce pourquoi nous vivons encore!
Il n'y a pas de raison pour continuer.
Je ne peux pas me contrler.
Plus de coups Plus de douleur...
Je ne peux pas tenir en place.
J'ai besoin d'un peu de temps.
Ce combat n'a pas de sens...
Pourquoi est-ce que je continue d'essayer ?
Mourir maintenant ou demain, quelle importance?
Je les prends tous la fois!
Je ne peux pas me tenir ici.
Vous n'avez pas me dire ce que j'ai faire !
Il me faut plus de temps.
Je ne peux pas agir de suite.
Avons-nous une relle raison de combattre ?
Je ne vous fais pas confiance!
Je ferai ce que j'ai besoin de faire!
J'ai besoin de sentir la douleur !
Non, je ne le ferais pas...
Je fais ce que je veux faire.
Je ferais ce qu'il faut faire.
Ces chuchotements continuent de me hanter.
Je ne tiens pas prir en ces lieux.

Ce n'est pas une bonne ide.

Non je vois quelque chose dans les ombres et je ne veux pas qu'elle s'approche
Un instant. Je sens quelque chose.
La douleur est un mode de vie.
Il faut souffrir, cela est essentiel.

Je dirige ce groupe, il me faut plus.

Je suis le cauchemar de ton me.

Je n'ai aucun intrt manger cette nourriture.

El Retornado no es nada sin su segadora, su escudo y su armadura pesada. Todo su equipamiento est imbuido de poderosa magia negra, algunos incluso creen que est posedo. Su inquebrantable escudo hace sangrar a sus enemigos y su oscura segadora los aniquila.
Los miembros de la orden de la sangre no viajan juntos.
Mi presencia intimida a los dbiles, los menos tolerantes no me acompaarn.
No se que es peor, una deidad pagana o un escudero anciano.
Un hombre de piedra no tiene valor para m.
Los miembros de la orden de la sangre no viajan juntos.
Me niego a viajar con otros caballeros sangreintos.
No confo en otros caballeros de sangre.
Los caballeros de sangre me desprecian un poco.

Oscuro y corrompido, el Retornado es un caballero sanguinario con una durabilidad inigualable. Como maestro de las artes oscuras, maldice la sangre de sus adversarios a costa de la suya propia, debilitndolos y aumentando su poder mientras sus enemigos sangran. Su meta es preservar el orden a travs del caos y la destruccin.

Retornado es un caballero de la sangre de la antigedad. Despreciado por muchos por una muy buena razn, debilita a su grupo para fortalecerse, sin embargo, necesitamos toda la ayuda que podamos obtener en estos tiempos difciles.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
Este vendaje debera serte de utilidad.
Tenis suerte de tenerme de vuestro lado, por ahora.
Deberais temerme ms a m que a este lugar.
Deja que la oscuridad fluya a travs de ti, abrzala!
Este lugar... se parece a mi hogar.
La muerte es solo el principio.
A travs del caos encontrar el orden.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr, mis heridas se cierran!.
Hemos llegado tan lejos gracias a m!
Por qu viajar con estos necios?.
El poder de las artes oscuras!
As que esto es sentir miedo.
Yo soy la razn por la que seguimos vivos!
Morir ahora o morir despus, no existe diferencia.
Tu no me dices lo que debo hacer!
Hare lo que debe ser echo.
no quiero morir en esta mazmorra.
Siento el mal a mi alrededor.
Soy el lder de esta expedicin.
Si sobrevivimos, me llevar todo la gloria!

No veo como vamos a sobrevivir a esto.

Hazme sentirme vivo una vez ms!

La prxima vez, intntalo con ms ganas.

Me niego a confiar en ti.
Eso no es lo correcto, debo sufrir.
No debera hacer eso, lo estn esperando.
No, eso es lo que quieren.
Eso es imprudente, mis heridas puede que no curen.
Necesito dolor, no quiero que mis heridas sanen.
El sufrimiento es el camino, no la curacin.
La curacin no me servir de nada.
No. El dolor es el camino.
El miedo es una emocin interesante.
El dolor es el camino de la vida.
Soy el lder de este grupo.
No confo en ninguno de vosotros.
Que forma de vivir tan pattica.
Recordad que estis vivos por lo permito.
Soy la medianoche de tu alma.
Que le ocurre a esta comida?
Le habis puesto algo a esta comida?

Upir byby nikim bez swojego bera, tarczy i cikiej zbroi. Cae to wyposaenie przesiknite jest najpotniejsz czarn magi - niektrzy mwi e moe by nawet przeklte. Jego niezomna tarcza tnie i kaleczy wszelkich wrogw, a bero miady ich ostatecznie.
Ludzie wiary nie potrafi znie mojej upiornej bytnoci.
Nie wiem co gorsze, obmierzy demon z otchani, czy jego stary sugus.
Czowiek z kamienia jest dla mnie bezwartociowy.
Nie przystan na wspprac z rycerzem krwi.
Rycerzom krwawego bractwa nie mona ufa.
Krwawi rycerze niezbyt za mn przepadaj.

Pospny i sparszywiay, Upir to krwawy wojownik o niezrwnanej mocy. Mistrz sztuk zakazanych, czerpic krew swoich przeciwnikw wyniszcza ich jednoczesnie samemu rosnc w si. Poprzez chaos i zniszczenie zaprowadza on porzdek na polu bitwy.
Revenant to rycerz krwi od staroytnoci. Zemszczony przez wielu z bardzo dobrego powodu, osabia swoj grup, aby wzmocni si jednak, potrzebujemy caej pomocy, jak moemy dosta w tych strasznych czasach.
To dziki mnie zaszlimy tak daleko, musz doprowadzi to do koca!
Te bandae z pewnoci ci si przydadz.
Masz szczcie, e jestem po twojej stronie ... Przynajmniej na razie.
Rb to co ka, a zwyciymy!
To nie to miejsce lecz ja powinienem by twym gwnym zmartwieniem.
Pozwl aby mrok ci wypeni. Suchaj go!
Czuj si tutaj... jak w domu.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Ciemnoci, przywr mnie!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Daj mi si!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. Moje rany si zamykaj!.
Wasze ycia nie maj dla mnie znaczenia!
Dotarlimy a tutaj tylko dziki mnie!

Moja obrona jest nie do przebicia!
Moja potga mrozi krew w yach!
To nie moe dobrze si skoczy.
Wszyscy znaczycie dla mnie tyle co nic!
Po co si w ogle wysila?
Te szepty s nie do zniesienia...
Po co nam cierpie, niech to si ju skoczy.
Przepa teraz czy pniej, co za rnica.
Nie bdziesz mi mwi co mam robi!

Nie chc umiera w tym lochu.
Nigdy nie chciaem podrowa z adnym z was.
Jeeli przeyjemy to caa chwaa przypadnie mnie!
Powinnimy po prostu spali si w tym ogniu.
To JA rozkazuj TOBIE, nie na odwrt!
Spraw ebym to czu! Spraw bym z nowu czu si ywy
Jak ja cie pierdolne to cie krew zaleje!
Przesta mi mwi co mam robi!
Nie moemy uciec przed nasz zgub.
mier to po prostu cz ycia.
Idzie nam jak krew z nosa.
Nie tak powinno by, potrzebuj cierpie.
To nie rozsdne, moje rany si nie zagoj.
Cierpienie jest mi potrzebne, nie leczenie.
Moja moje rany i tak nie krzepn.
Powinnimy po prostu z td odej.
Pamitajcie o tym, e yjecie tylko dlatego ,e na to pozwalam
Co jest nie tak z tym jedzeniem...
Czy nie dodalicie czego do mojego jedzenia?
Bd jad kiedy mi sie podoba.

The Revenant is nothing without his reaver, his shield, and his heavy armor. All of his gear is imbued with powerful dark magic - some even say it's possessed. His unbreakable shield bleeds his enemies, and his bloodthirsty reaver breaks them.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
My presence is intimidating; religious classes will not accompany me.
I don't know what's worse, an eldritch deity or an old shieldbearer.
A man of stone is worthless to me.
Members of the blood order don't travel together.
I refuse to travel with a sanguine knight.
Blood knights despise me quite a bit.

Dark and corrupted, the Revenant is a sanguine knight with unmatched durability. As a master of the dark arts, he saps the blood of his adversaries at a cost, weakens them and empowers himself as his enemies bleed. He strives to preserve order through chaos and destruction.
Revenant is a blood knight from the ancient age. Despised by many for a very good reason, he weakens his group to strengthen himself however, we need all the help we can get in these dire times.
I'm the reason we made it this far, I need to see it through!
This bandage should be of use to you.
You are lucky i'm on your side... for now.
Follow my lead and we will prevail!
You should fear me more than this place.
Let the darkness flow through you! Embrace it!
The end is only the beginning.
Through chaos, I will have order.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Darkness, restore me!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Give me strength!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. My wounds close!.
Your lives matter not to me!
We only made it this far because of me!
Why am I travelling with these fools?
The power of the dark arts!
So this is what fear feels like...
I know what you are up to.
Come out! I know you are there!
You all mean nothing to me!
All of this belongs to me!
I am the reason we still live!
You will give me your blood!
There is no reason to continue.
I will not speak to you.
We should just let it go.
To perish now or later, it makes no difference.
You do not tell me what to do!
I'm unable to take action right now.
Why should I even care about this?
I will attack when I want to!
I will do what I need to!
Why should I listen to you?
I will win this on my own.
I do what I want to do.
I will do what I need to do.
I do not want to perish in this dungeon.
There is something in the dark.
Be on your guard - we are being watched.
I never wanted to travel with any of you.
I wish you were more competent.
I'm the leader of this expedition.
If we survive, I will take all the glory!
We should just cook ourselves in this fire.
I just don't see us surviving this.
Maybe I should just go back...
I command YOU, not the other way around!
Make me feel it! Make me feel alive again!
I know what you are up to.
Stop telling me what to do!
No, they are waiting to ambush us!
Dying is just a part of living.
I'm sick and tired of you.
Why are you in my way?
No! Why did you attack so soon?
You wanted to miss, didn't you?
Is it so hard to dodge?
Just move out of the way.
This is not a good idea.
Where are all the enemies hiding?
We cannot go the other way.
That is not ideal - I need to suffer.
I do not listen to your commands.
Get out of my head, reaver.
I shouldn't do that - they are anticipating it.
No, that's just what they want.
That is unwise - my wounds may not heal.
Suffering is the way - healing is not.
There is no reason to heal me.
I make the decisions around here.
That will not help our cause.
That is not a wise idea.
Fear is such an interesting emotion.
Something is lurking in the shadows.
Pain is a way of life.
I'm the leader of this group.
This fear is getting to me.
I don't trust any of you.
Such a sad example of life.
We should just leave this place.
Remember that you are alive only because I allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
There's something wrong with this food...
Did you put something in this food?
You're fighting for a lost cause.
I will eat whenever I feel like it.

O Regressado no nada sem seu devastador, seu escudo, e sua armadura pesada. Todo o seu equipamento est imbudo de poderosa magia negra - alguns at dizem que ela possuda. Seu escudo inquebrvel sangra seus inimigos, e seu devastador sanguinrio os quebra.
Membros da ordem sangrenta no viajam juntos.
Minha presena intimidadora; classes religiosas no iro me acompanhar.
Eu no sei o que pior, uma entidade esquecida ou um velho portador de escudo.
Um homem de pedra inutil pra mim.
Membros da ordem sangrenta no viajam juntos.
Eu recuso viajar com cavaleiros sanguneos.
Eu no confio em cavaleiros carmesim.
Cavaleiros do sangue me odeiam consideravelmente.

Escuro e amaldioado, o Regressado um cavaleiro sanguneo com durabilidade inigualvel. Como mestre das artes negras, Ele jorra o sangue de seus adversrios por um preo, enfraquece e empodera a si mesmo enquanto seus inimigos sangram. Ele luta para preservar a ordem atravs de caos e destruio.

O Regressado um cavaleiro de sangue da idade antiga. Desprezado por muitos por uma razo muito boa, ele enfraquece seu grupo para se fortalecer, no entanto, precisamos de toda a ajuda que podemos obter nestes tempos difceis.
Eu sou a razo de temos ido to longe, eu preciso terminar isso!
Este curativo deve ser de uso para voc.
Voc tem sorte de eu estar do seu lado... por enquanto.
Siga minha liderana e iremos prevalescer!
Voc deveria sentir mais medo de mim do que desse lugar.
Deixe a escurido fluir sobre voc! Abrace-a!
Esse lugar me faz sentir... em casa.
Atravs do caos, eu terei a ordem.
Gwuon' hwash, hwa'tha. Escurido, me restore!
Aarm' dwahm, xan'thon. Me d fora!.
Urn'dom gahl, mahr. Minhas feridas fecham!.
Suas vidas no importam para mim!
Eles esto em todo o lugar!
S fomos to longe por causa minha!
Por que eu estou viajando com esses idiotas?
Ento isto o que o medo se parece...
Eu sei o que est tentando fazer.
Venha! Eu sei que est ai!
Vocs todos no so nada pra mim!
Eu sou a razo de ainda estarmos vivos!
Voc vai me dar seu sangue!
Eu no irei falar com voc.
Eu no posso ficar parado aqui.
Por que eu continuo tentando mesmo?
Ns deveriamos apenas deixar isso ir.
Perecer agora ou depois, no faz diferena.
No me diga o que fazer!
Eu no posso fazer nada agora.
Por que eu devo me importar com isso?
Eu irei atacar quando eu quiser!
Eu irei fazer o que eu preciso!
Por que eu deveria ti escutar?
Eu vou ganhar isso da minha forma.
Eu fao o que eu quiser.
Eu irei fazer o que eu precisar.
Eu no quero perecer nesta masmorra.
Eu sinto maldade ao meu redor.
No abaixe a guarda - estamos sendo observados.
Eu nunca quis viajar com nenhum de vocs.
Eu queria que fossem mais competentes.
Eu sou o lider desta expedio.
Se sobrevivermos, eu irei levar toda a glria!
ns deveriamos apenas nos cozinhar no fogo.
Eu s no nos vejos sobrevivendo a isto.
Eu comando VOC, e no o contrrio!
Faa-me sentir! me faa sentir vivo de novo!
Eu sei o que voc quer fazer.
Eu no posso ir mais longe.
Pare de me dizer o que fazer!
No, eles esto esperando para nos emboscar!
Ns no podemos escapar nosso fim.
Morrer apenas uma parte de viver.
Estou enjoado e cansado de voc.
Eu no posso me mover direito.
Eu acho que isso foi planejado.
Eles esto em todo o luygar.
Eu deveria ter atacado mais cedo.
Por que voc est no meu caminho?
No! Por que voc me atacou to cedo?
Eu escuto eles atrs da gente.
Onde esto todos os inimigos se escondendo?
Ns no podemos ir por outro caminho.
Eu me recuso a confiar em voc.
Isso no ideal - eu preciso sofrer.
Eu no deveria fazer isto - eles esto antecipando.
No, apenas o que eles querem.
Isso no sbio - minhas feridas no podem se curar.
Sofrer o caminho - se curar no .
No h razo para me curar.
Me curar no ir me ajudar.
Eu posso sobreviver sem a cura.
No! Eu no irei me curar!
Eu fao as decises por aqui.
A dor um modo de vida.
Eu estou me coando por uma luta.
Eu sou o lder deste grupo.
Eu no posso mais aguentar isso.
Eu no confio em nenhum de vocs.
Ns devemos apenas sair deste lugar.
Lembrem que esto vivos apenas por que eu permito.
Eu sou a meia noite da sua alma.
Tem algo de errado com essa comida...
Voc est lutando por uma causa perdida.
Eu vou comer quando eu sentir vontade.
